description: The lights dim and the Motown 25 special begins. The audience settles and applause rises.
The Jackson 5 take the stage for a nostalgic medley of their classic hits.
After the Jackson 5 performance, the stage clears as Michael prepares for his solo performance.
Michael Jackson walks onto the stage to perform Billie Jean, wearing his iconic fedora and sequined jacket.
Michael begins singing Billie Jean, gliding across the stage with precise, rhythmic movements.
During the Billie Jean performance, Michael performs the moonwalk for the first time on television, electrifying the audience.
Michael hits his final pose for Billie Jean as the music fades and the crowd roars.
The Motown 25 special concludes and the audience gives a final round of applause as the credits roll.
